name: REFERRAL_5
description: The REFERRAL_5 table is a continuation of the REFERRAL_4 table. The REFERRAL_* tables are the primary tables for referral information stored in the system.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_7
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral time item 7.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_8
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral time item 8.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_9
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral time item 9.

columns.name: GEN_RFL_SEC_SINCE_MIDNIGHT_10
columns.description: This contains information from generic referral time item 10.

columns.name: RPT_REF_TO_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: Stores an override value that indicates the referred to provider/location/vendor/department should be considered contracted or not for Medicare Advantage ODAG reporting. If NULL, system defined logic will be used. If Y, a user marked the provider as contracted (CP in ODAG). If N, a user marked the provider as non-contracted (NCP in ODAG).

columns.name: RPT_REF_BY_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: Stores an override value that indicates the referred by provider/location/department should be considered contracted or not for Medicare Advantage ODAG reporting. If NULL, system defined logic will be used. If Y, a user marked the provider as contracted (CP in ODAG). If N, a user marked the provider as non-contracted (NCP in ODAG).

columns.name: LIVING_SITUATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Describes who the patient or child lives with.

columns.name: FIRST_APPOINTMENT_BY_DATE
columns.description: The date that the first appointment for the referral should occur by.

columns.name: SENIORITY_DATE
columns.description: The Seniority Date for the referral which represents a 'start date' that might have been set before the referral was created.

columns.name: CASE_WORKER_NAME
columns.description: The case manager of the child psychology case.

columns.name: CHILD_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the child welfare service role in connection with child psychology services.

columns.name: PARENTAL_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates which entity has parental responsibility for the patient.

columns.name: CONSENT_TO_TREAT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the status of obtaining the patient's consent in connection with the referral's transfer of medical record information.

columns.name: FORWARDED_EVALUATION_DATE
columns.description: This date represents the date an external organization evaluated or triaged the referral before forwarding it to an Epic instance. This date represents the internal concept of Triage History Instant, for the forwarding decision done at the external organization.

columns.name: EMSG_COMM_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item is part of a link to a communication from which the referral was created. This item contains the CSN of the contact which contains the communication. EMSG_COMM_JOB_ID (I RFL 18961) contains the communication job ID.

columns.name: EMSG_COMM_JOB_ID
columns.description: Part of a link to a communication from which the referral was created.

columns.name: AUTHORIZED_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the medication being authorized in this referral.

columns.name: INITIAL_REQUEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The initial request type for the referral.

columns.name: REF_BY_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by entities on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_TO_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to entities on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_BY_SER_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by provider on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_TO_SER_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to provider on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_BY_EAF_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by location on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_TO_EAF_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to location on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_TO_VEN_CNTRCT_AT_AUTH_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to vendor on the referral as of the last decision or the current contracted status if the referral is pending.

columns.name: REF_BY_PROV_NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The network status of the referred-by provider on the referral.

columns.name: REF_TO_LOCATION_NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The network status of the referred-to location on the referral.

columns.name: REF_TO_VENDOR_NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The network status of the referred-to vendor on the referral.

columns.name: REF_TO_PROV_NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The network status of the referred-to provider on the referral.

columns.name: REF_BY_LOCATION_NET_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The network status of the referred-by location on the referral.

columns.name: RPT_REF_BY_SER_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: The user override for the contracted status of the referred-by provider on the referral.

columns.name: RPT_REF_TO_SER_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: The user override for the contracted status of the referred-to provider on the referral.

columns.name: RPT_REF_BY_EAF_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: The user override for the contracted status of the referred-by location on the referral.

columns.name: RPT_REF_TO_EAF_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: The user override for the contracted status of the referred-to location on the referral.

columns.name: RPT_REF_TO_VEN_CNTRCT_YN
columns.description: The user override for the contracted status of the referred-to vendor on the referral.

columns.name: RFL_AUTH_PROG_C_NAME
columns.description: Authorization Prognosis code associated with a referral

columns.name: PRINCIPAL_DX_DATE
columns.description: Specifies the diagnois date used for Prinicpal Diagnosis

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source from which the paitent is being admitted or referred. Only available in UM referrals.

columns.name: DISCHRG_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description: This disposition (location) of the patient after discharge. Only available in UM referrals.

columns.name: FIRST_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Ths CSN of the encounter linked to the referral or auth/cert with the earliest encounter instant.

columns.name: LAST_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Ths CSN of the encounter linked to the referral or auth/cert with the latest encounter instant.

columns.name: REF_BY_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by entities on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_TO_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to entities on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_BY_SER_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by provider on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_TO_SER_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to provider on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_BY_LOC_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-by location on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_TO_LOC_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to location on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REF_TO_VEN_CNTRCT_AT_DEC_YN
columns.description: The contracted status of referred-to vendor on the referral as of the last decision.

columns.name: REGION_ID
columns.description: The facility profile ID of the region on the coverage used for this referral.

columns.name: MEDICAL_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The facility profile ID of the medical group on the coverage used for this referral.

columns.name: PRIMARY_CONDITION_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Primary condition for which the patient is being referred as a Search Condition MAG record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_TREATMENT_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Primary treatment for which the patient is being referred as a Search Treatment MAG record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_SPECIALTY_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Primary specialty to which the patient is being referred as a Search Specialty MAG record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_SUBSPEC_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Primary subspecialty to which the patient is being referred as a Search Subspecialty MAG record.

columns.name: CONC_UM_REV_TRANS_FROM_DELE_YN
columns.description: Indicates if the responsiblity for concurrent review of this authorization request has been transitioned from a delegate system to this UM system.
